title: Breakingviews TV: In the bank
text:
Breakingviews TV: In the bank Monday, April 16, 2018 - 04:30 
Bank of America continued the run of solid bank results with nearly $7 bln of first-quarter earnings. Antony Currie and Tom Buerkle discuss how investors have already priced in gains from tax cuts and want to see stronger top-line growth before bidding up banks’ shares. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Bank of America continued the run of solid bank results with nearly $7 bln of first-quarter earnings. Antony Currie and Tom Buerkle discuss how investors have already priced in gains from tax cuts and want to see stronger top-line growth before bidding up banks’ shares.
